// function to show hide localLanguage DropdownListbox
function showLanguageList(sType,sLngDwl)
{
    if(parseInt(sType)==10 || parseInt(sType)==11)
    {    
        if (typeof(document.getElementById(sLngDwl)) == "object")
        {
            document.getElementById(sLngDwl).style.display='';
        }
        
    }
    else 
    {          
         if (typeof(document.getElementById(sLngDwl)) == "object")
        {
            document.getElementById(sLngDwl).style.display='none';
        }       
    }
}
// function to show hide search type based on searchoption
function showList(sOption,spTable,slTable,soTable)
{

    if(parseInt(sOption)==0)
    {           
         document.getElementById(spTable).style.display='';
         document.getElementById(slTable).style.display='none';  
         document.getElementById(soTable).style.display='none';
         document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue").focus(); 
         document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue").value="";       
    }
    else if(parseInt(sOption)==1)
    {          
         document.getElementById(slTable).style.display='';
         document.getElementById(spTable).style.display='none';
         document.getElementById(soTable).style.display='none';  
         document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue_loc").focus(); 
         document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue_loc").value="";        
    }
    else if(parseInt(sOption)==2)
    {          
         document.getElementById(soTable).style.display='';
         document.getElementById(spTable).style.display='none';
         document.getElementById(slTable).style.display='none';
         document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue_org").focus(); 
         document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue_org").value="";
    }

}

// Function to trim the string
function trim(s) {
  while (s.substring(0,1) == ' ') {
    s = s.substring(1,s.length);
  }
  while (s.substring(s.length-1,s.length) == ' ') {
    s = s.substring(0,s.length-1);
  }
  return s;
}

// Function to validate the search value for IE....
function ValidateFilter_IE(sOption)
{
   try
   {    
  var kcode=window.event.keyCode; 
   //var kcode=document.window.event.which;
   
   if (kcode==0)
   {
    if (typeof(document.getElementById(sOption)) == "object")
	    {	
	          var _intOption= document.getElementById(sOption).value;	
	        
	            if(parseInt(_intOption)==0) //People
	            {               
		                if (typeof(document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue")) == "object")
		                {
		                    var sSearchVal = trim(document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue").value); 		                    		        
		                    if(sSearchVal=="")
		                     {	
		                      alert("Please enter search query.");	    
			                  document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue").focus();
			                  return false;
		                     }	                    
		                     if ((sSearchVal.indexOf("@")!=-1)&& (sSearchVal.substring(sSearchVal.indexOf("@"),sSearchVal.length).toLowerCase()!="@hp.com"))
		                     {
		                     alert("Invalid HP E-mail ID - " + sSearchVal);
		                     document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue").focus();
		                     return false
		                     }
		                     
		                }
		        }		
	             if(parseInt(_intOption)==1) // Location
	             {               
		                 if (typeof(document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue_loc")) == "object")
		                {
		                    var sSearchVal = trim(document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue_loc").value); 		        
		                    if(sSearchVal=="")
		                     {	
		                      alert("Please enter search query.");	    
			                  document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue_loc").focus();
			                  return false;
		                     }
		                     if ((sSearchVal.indexOf("@")!=-1)&& (sSearchVal.substring(sSearchVal.indexOf("@"),sSearchVal.length).toLowerCase()!="@hp.com"))
		                     {
		                     alert("Invalid HP E-mail ID - " + sSearchVal);
		                     document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue_loc").focus();
		                     return false
		                     }
		                }
		           }	
	             if(parseInt(_intOption)==2) //organization
	            {       
	                    if (typeof(document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue_org")) == "object")
		                {
		                    var sSearchVal = trim(document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue_org").value); 		        
		                    if(sSearchVal=="")
		                     {	
		                      alert("Please enter search query.");	    
			                  document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue_org").focus();
			                  return false;
		                     }
		                     if ((sSearchVal.indexOf("@")!=-1)&& (sSearchVal.substring(sSearchVal.indexOf("@"),sSearchVal.length).toLowerCase()!="@hp.com"))
		                     {
		                     alert("Invalid HP E-mail ID - " + sSearchVal);
		                     document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue_org").focus();
		                     return false
		                     }
		                }
		         }
		}
	StripParenthesis(sOption)
	}
	}catch(err)
	{
	}	
    
    return true;
}

//function to prevent invalid character...
 function _HPEPKeycode_IE()
{
	var KeyValue=window.event.keyCode;
	//alert(KeyValue);
	//Considering only characters from a-z A-Z 1-9 0 @ - _ . , \ Enter space
	if((KeyValue >=97 && KeyValue <=122)||(KeyValue >=65 && KeyValue <=90)||(KeyValue >=49 && KeyValue <=57)||(KeyValue==48)||(KeyValue==42)||(KeyValue==64)||(KeyValue==46)||(KeyValue==92)||(KeyValue==45)||(KeyValue==95)||(KeyValue==13)||(KeyValue==44)||(KeyValue==32)||(KeyValue==40)||(KeyValue==41)||(KeyValue==43)||(KeyValue==47))
	{
		//Displays the entered Character
		return true;
	}
	else
	{
		//Do not Display the entered character
		event.keyCode=0;
		return false;
	}
	
}
// for firefox....
function _HPEPKeycode_Mozilla(Key)
{
//alert(Key);
	//Considering only characters from a-z A-Z 1-9 0 @ - _ . , \ Enter space and Back Space
	if((Key >=97 && Key <=122)||(Key >=65 && Key <=90)||(Key >=49 && Key <=57)||(Key==48)||(Key==42)||(Key==0)||(Key==64)||(Key==46)||(Key==92)||(Key==8)||(Key==45)||(Key==95)||(Key==13)||(Key==44)||(Key==32)||(Key==40)||(Key==41)||(Key==43)||(Key==47))
	{ 
		//Displays the entered Character
		return true;
	}
	{
		//Do not Display the entered character
		return false;
	}
	
}


// strip parenthesis
function StripParenthesis(sOption)
	{	
	    try
	    {
	    if (typeof(document.getElementById(sOption)) == "object")
	    {
	        var _intOption= document.getElementById(sOption).value;	
	        
	            if(parseInt(_intOption)==0) //People
	            {               
		                if (typeof(document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue")) == "object")
		                {
		                    var sSearchVal = document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue").value; 		        
		                    if(!((sSearchVal.indexOf("-") > 2 && ((!isNaN(sSearchVal.charAt(0))) || sSearchVal.charAt(0) == "(" )) || (!isNaN(sSearchVal))))
		                     {		    
			                  document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue").value  = sSearchVal.replace(/\(.*\)/i,"");			
		                     }
		                }
		        }		
	             if(parseInt(_intOption)==1) // Location
	             {               
		                 if (typeof(document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue_loc")) == "object")
		                {
		                    var sSearchVal = document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue_loc").value; 		        
		                     if(!((sSearchVal.indexOf("-") > 2 && ((!isNaN(sSearchVal.charAt(0))) || sSearchVal.charAt(0) == "(" )) || (!isNaN(sSearchVal))))
		                     {		    
			                 document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue_loc").value  = sSearchVal.replace(/\(.*\)/i,"");			
		                     }
		                }
		           }	
	             if(parseInt(_intOption)==2) //organization
	            {               
		                 if (typeof(document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue_org")) == "object")
		                {
		                    var sSearchVal = document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue_org").value; 		        
		                     if(!((sSearchVal.indexOf("-") > 2 && ((!isNaN(sSearchVal.charAt(0))) || sSearchVal.charAt(0) == "(" )) || (!isNaN(sSearchVal))))
		                    {		    
			                document.getElementById("ctl00_contMaster_txtSearchValue_org").value  = sSearchVal.replace(/\(.*\)/i,"");			
		                    }
		                }
		         }
		}
		}catch(exc)	
		{
		}
	}

			function SplitAddress(sAddress) {

			function SplitAddressBlank(sAddress) {

			<!--Anita,05/05/2005,Get real estate id from work loctaion, ECR 762 -->
			function GetRealEstateID(sWorkLocation){
				var index = sWorkLocation.indexOf("hpRealEstateID=");
				if( index == -1 )
				  return;
				  
				index = sWorkLocation.indexOf("=");
				var indexOfFirstBreak = sWorkLocation.indexOf(",");
			        document.write( sWorkLocation.substring(index+1,indexOfFirstBreak) );
				return;											       
			}

			}
